panels.description: The size of the message being published during this test in bytes.

panels.description: Each node has 1 JMS producer and 1 Kafka consumer

panels.description: The average time it takes for the test consumer to receive a message from the test publisher.

panels.description: The rate at which the test Kafka consumer is reading messages from Kafka.

panels.description: The rate of messages being added and acked to/from a queue. Includes the total size of the queue which indicates queue depth.
